forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low around 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
